title: Like Woah ( Phylicia Rashad and Mike Epps Interview)
itunes:title: Like Woah ( Phylicia Rashad and Mike Epps Interview)
description:
Today on the show we had the pleasure to talk to a queen and idol Phylicia Rashad who spoke on her experience working on different shows finding her way through hollywood and more. Also, comedian Mike Epps called in and spoke about hip hop legends, The Upshaws and more. And Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to America for our own arrogance.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
